title: New: Azealia Banks – Fuck Up The Fun (Prod. By Diplo)
body:
I’m still to be convinced by **Azealia Banks**.

Sure, I find her music rather interesting, but not to the point of me actually wanting to relisten; it’s just an experience that gets tiresome rather quickly. New track, _Fuck Up The Fun_ produced by none other than **Diplo** is supposedly a diss towards **Iggy** and **T.I.** yet as far as put downs go, it’s fairly weak. There’s plenty of **Azealia’s** stereotypical highly offensive spouting, however, to be honest, it’s getting monotonous; come on **Azealia**, we know you’re better than this. At least it has a good beat, right?

New track, Fuck Up The Fun produced by none other than Diplo is supposedly a diss towards Iggy and T.I. \[…\]
